CustomField.description: This is the # of Days on the Project This field correlates to the Start Date fields for Shoot Confirmation, 1st Hold, 2nd Hold, to determine proper end dates in the Calendar
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the # of Days on the Project This field correlates to the Start Date fields for Shoot Confirmation, 1st Hold, 2nd Hold, to determine proper end dates in the Calendar
CustomField.label: # Days On Project
